    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105283</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105283</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086756</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pornography Hearings.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pornographie-Hörfähigkeiten.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Auditions de Pornographie.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hearings Do Pornography.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Udienze Di Pornografia.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακροάσεις πορνογραφίας.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Audiencias De la Pornografía.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Attorney-General Edwin Meese's Commission on Pornography was appointed during Ronald Reagan's second presidential term to appease conservative and fundamentalist supporters who felt the Reagan Revolution" had not sufficiently altered the nation's social agenda. During 1985 and 1986</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtsanwalt-Allgemeinen Edwin Meeses wurde Kommission auf
Pornographie während Ronald Reagans der an zweiter Stelle 
Präsidentenzeitdauer ernannt, um konservatives zu beschwichtigen und 
fundamentalistische Verfechter, die der Reagan Umdrehung "glaubten, 
hatten nicht genug die Sozialtagesordnung der Nation geändert. 
Während 1985 und 1986</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Commission d'Edwin Meese Mandataire-Général sur la 
pornographie a été nommée pendant la limite en second lieu 
présidentielle de Ronald Reagan pour apaiser conservateur et les 
défenseurs fondamentalistes qui ont senti la révolution de Reagan 
"n'avaient pas suffisamment modifié l'ordre du jour social de la 
nation. Pendant 1985 et 1986</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O commission de Edwin Meese Advogado-Geral no pornography 
foi apontado durante o termo em segundo presidencial de Ronald Reagan 
para appease conservador e os supporters fundamentalistas que sentiram
a volta de Reagan "não tinham alterado suficientemente a agenda 
social da nação. Durante 1985 e 1986</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Commissione di Edwin Meese Avvocato-Generale su 
pornografia è stata nominata durante il termine in secondo luogo 
presidenziale di Ronald Reagan per calmare il conservatore ed i 
sostenitori di fondamentalista che hanno ritenuto la rivoluzione del 
Reagan "sufficientemente non avevano alterato l'ordine del giorno 
sociale della nazione. Durante 1985 ed il 1986</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Επιτροπή του Edwin Meese's γενικών εισαγγελέων 
στην πορνογραφία διορίστηκε κατά τη διάρκεια του δεύτερου 
προεδρικού όρου του Ronald Reagan's για να κατευνάσει τους 
συντηρητικούς και θεμελιωτόντες υποστηρικτές που αισθάνθηκαν ότι 
η επανάσταση Reagan "δεν είχε αλλάξει αρκετά την κοινωνική 
ημερήσια διάταξη του έθνους. Κατά τη διάρκεια του 1985 
και του 1986</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Designaron a la Comisión de Edwin Meese Abogado-General 
en pornografía durante el término en segundo lugar presidencial de 
Ronald Reagan para apaciguir conservador y los partidarios 
fundamentalistas que sentían la revolución de Reagan "no habían 
alterado suficientemente la agenda social de la nación. Durante
1985 y 1986</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
FN:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086756</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105283</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/pornography-hearings</uri>

  </manifestation>
